releaseNotes: This release includes minor bug fixes, and we've laid down the foundations for cool upcoming features.
description:
Meet Curve Pay – Your All-in-One Smart Wallet & Travel Payment App 
Say goodbye to wallet clutter and hello to smarter spending with Curve Pay. This powerful app lets you combine all your debit and credit cards into one sleek, easy-to-use travel card—perfect for life at home or on the go. Pay effortlessly with your phone anywhere in the world, using Curve Pay with no need for a physical card.

Curve Pay helps you maximise cashback and rewards on every purchase while saving you money abroad with real exchange rates and zero hidden FX or ATM fees. Plus, you’ll unlock exclusive perks and offers from top brands just for using the app.

Whether you’re shopping around the corner or exploring new countries, Curve Pay makes spending simpler, safer, and far more rewarding.

Download Curve Pay today and take control of your payments!

Select Your Plan 

Curve Pay (Free): Add unlimited cards (credit card, debit card) in one travel card and digital wallet. Make contactless payments. 2.99% foreign currency exchange rate fee applies for international travel. 

Curve Pay X: Add unlimited cards (including debit cards) in your smart wallet, use Curve Pay for tap to pay contactless payments, get free global ATM withdrawals up to £300/month & enjoy competitive currency exchange rates for travel worldwide & cashback. 

Curve Pay Pro: Link unlimited debit and credit card options to your smart wallet, use any payment app including wearable devices, earn 1% cashback at 6 exclusive retailers, get competitive currency exchange rates, and £500/month free global ATM withdrawals. 

Curve Pay Pro+: All premium features including the ability to load unlimited cards to your Curve Pay wallet, £1000/month free global ATM withdrawals, all payment app options, get 1% cashback rewards at 12 retailers, competitive FX rates, plus discounted worldwide airport LoungeKey access. Ideal for those who travel frequently, like nomads working remotely, expats and travelers in general. 

All Your Cards in One Smart Wallet
Curve Pay connects your debit card, credit card, and PayPal account into one smart wallet for contactless payment. Your digital wallet enables tap to pay cardless transactions through Curve Pay for travel purchases worldwide. Link your digital wallet for multiple payment app options - perfect for contactless payment (pay by phone) while traveling.

Safe Travels
Your card numbers stay protected with Curve Pay's secure digital wallet when you travel abroad. When using our digital wallet and payment app, your transactions are always secure. Lock your contactless payment card instantly in the Curve Pay wallet if lost or compromised.

Unique Features

Go Back in TimeⓇ: Move payments between cards up to 120 days after purchase (limits based on subscription tier)

Anti-embarrassment mode: Never experience declined payments with contactless payment options

Smart Rules: Automate card choices 

Enhanced rewards: Get cashback instantly with cardless payments

Lock/unlock your digital wallet instantly in the mobile banking Wallet

Keep all your debit and credit card numbers hidden

Track cashback rewards, currency exchange rates, and spending

Seamless integration with Samsung Pay, GPay, and Garmin Pay

Budget tracker and expense monitoring built-in for efficient financial management.

You need to be 18 years or older to sign up.
Terms and privacy policy apply at https://www.curve.com/en-gb/legal/. Free currency exchange subject to limits and weekend charges. Get competitive FX rates for travel. Cashback rewards with selected retailers. Limits and exclusions apply. See terms for details.
